评论详情: I got this as a stocking stuffer for my daughter bc she has a huge chain collection & this one looked different than her others, not to mention she absolutely loves spikes. I wasn’t sure what to expect at $5, but once I opened it I understood how they could price it so low. It does look as pictured but it is incredibly light weight. From what I can tell, the  spikes are hollow & im not totally sure if this chain is even metal. Don’t get me wrong it looks like metal & looks amazing as a decoration on clothing, but not nearly as heavy duty as some of her other chains. Totally worth the $5 though just nothing more
Gonna be a good stocking stuffer for my daughter.  A good value.  She's gonna like it because she's in to adding accessories to her pants right now.
